patch:
diff --git a/pygments/lexers/shell.py b/pygments/lexers/shell.py
index 8f074c97..e84f2981 100644
--- a/pygments/lexers/shell.py
+++ b/pygments/lexers/shell.py
@@ -362,8 +362,9 @@ class BatchLexer(RegexLexer):
         if compound:
             state.append((r'(?=\))', Text, '#pop'))
         state += [
-            (rf'{_start_label}([{_ws}]*)({_label_compound if compound else _label})(.*)',
-             bygroups(Text, Punctuation, Text, Name.Label, Comment.Single)),
+            (r'(:)(:.*)$', bygroups(Punctuation, Comment.Single), '#pop'),
+            (rf'({_label_compound if compound else _label})([{_ws}]*){_start_label}({_label_compound if compound else _label})(.*)',
+             bygroups(Name.Label, Text, Text, Punctuation, Name.Label, Text)),
             include(f'redirect{suffix}'),
             (rf'(?=[{_nl}])', Text, '#pop'),
             (r'\|\|?|&&?', Punctuation, '#pop'),
